items.title: akku1139/web-reader: A simple and lightweight viewer for viewing websites in text only

items.content_html: A lightweight and robust CalDAV client for Node.js applications, written in TypeScript. This library enables seamless integration with CalDAV servers to manage calendars, events, and tasks.
items.title: KlautNet/ts-caldav: A lightweight and robust CalDAV client for Node.js applications, written in TypeScript. This library enables seamless integration with CalDAV servers to manage calendars, events, and tasks.

items.content_html: (integration) pdf2image is a lightweight JavaScript library to convert PDF pages into images (PNG, JPG, WebP) with real-time progress tracking and optional ZIP compression.
items.title: pardnchiu/pdf2image: (integration) pdf2image is a lightweight JavaScript library to convert PDF pages into images (PNG, JPG, WebP) with real-time progress tracking and optional ZIP compression.

items.content_html: The Contact Book app stores and manages contacts using Local Storage, allowing users to save, edit, delete, and search contacts without a server. Data persists in the browser, ensuring availability after refresh. It uses key-value pairs to manage data, making it lightweight and ideal for small-scale, server-independent applications.
items.title: sweethatwar/Contact_Book_ls: The Contact Book app stores and manages contacts using Local Storage, allowing users to save, edit, delete, and search contacts without a server. Data persists in the browser, ensuring availability after refresh. It uses key-value pairs to manage data, making it lightweight and ideal for small-scale, server-independent applications.

items.content_html: A modern and lightweight music streaming application built with Angular and NgRx. MelodyStream offers an intuitive interface for managing and playing local audio files with features like CRUD operations for tracks, advanced state management, and an interactive audio player.
items.title: Radiaidel/MelodyStream: A modern and lightweight music streaming application built with Angular and NgRx. MelodyStream offers an intuitive interface for managing and playing local audio files with features like CRUD operations for tracks, advanced state management, and an interactive audio player.

items.content_html: Cometa.js is a lightweight and high performance library designed to streamline transaction building and smart contract interactions on the Cardano blockchain.
items.title: Biglup/cometa.js: Cometa.js is a lightweight and high performance library designed to streamline transaction building and smart contract interactions on the Cardano blockchain.

items.content_html: WebAudioActivator is a lightweight script designed to enable audio playback on web pages by overcoming autoplay restrictions in modern browsers. It triggers audio when the user interacts with the page, such as clicking or pressing a key..
items.title: Cloudveerge/WebAudioActivator: WebAudioActivator is a lightweight script designed to enable audio playback on web pages by overcoming autoplay restrictions in modern browsers. It triggers audio when the user interacts with the page, such as clicking or pressing a key..

items.content_html: a collection of lightweight TypeScript packages for AT Protocol, the protocol powering Bluesky.

items.content_html: The Task Prioritization Assistant is a microSaaS web app for managing, organizing, and prioritizing tasks. Featuring a sleek, responsive dark-themed UI, it‚Äôs ideal for individuals, freelancers, and small teams seeking a lightweight solution to streamline workflows, track deadlines, and focus on high-priority tasks efficiently.
